attributes.action: authorise the playing of the song 'Rose Of England' at all English sports events.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every country in the British Isles has it's own national song to play at sports events except England.  English teams always play 'God Save The Queen' which is the British anthem not the English anthem.  Let the English teams walk out to 'Rose Of England'.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
